channel.title: Crop on AgroFIMS Help Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Crop on AgroFIMS Help Documentation
channel.copyright: Copyright © AgroFIMS 2020 [Terms of Use and Privacy Policy](https://agrofims.github.io/helpdocs/policyterms/)

item.title: Adding a crop
item.description: To add a crop or a variety to the experiment: Select the type of cropping system of your experiment. Currently the choices are: Monocrop, Intercrop or Relay crop. Select the crop’s common name. If the crop is not listed, select ‘’Other’’ and specify the crop common name. If “Intercrop” or “Relay crop” are selected, AgroFIMS will require you to add at least 2 crops. To add more, click on + Add crop.

item.title: Importing a list of varieties
item.description: It is not currently possible to import a list of varieties or genotypes. You will need to manually enter or paste on by one your variety names in the text box: Variety name(s).
